articles.title: I was bullied at school but now I’m a millionaire at 18 thanks to Bitcoin, my car’s worth $350k & I make $2... - The Sun
articles.content:
A TEENAGER who was bullied throughout high school is now a self-proclaimed millionaire after investing in Cryptocurrency over four years.
Samuel Snell, from Australia, is now able to live a lavish l… [+3884 chars]
